29Maternal and Perinatal Health Outcomes
Conclusions 
The first year of the SMGL initiative (Phase 1) 
resulted in dramatic reductions in maternal 
deaths and improved maternal and perinatal 
health outcomes in SMGL-affiliated facilities in 
both Uganda and Zambia.
In both countries, important gains were
